original_title: Madrid tumba del fascio: Cuarta jornada - Documental número 8
overview: A fragment of a pro-Republican documentary short made during the Spanish Civil War.  It depicts fighting in and around Madrid in 1937.

production_companies.name: sindicato de la industria del espectáculo (SIE)

title: Madrid, Tomb of Fascism: Day Four (Documentary 8)
